ygData.subject: (OT) Vodka recipe (was: RE: bards agi & dodge)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Um.... *cough* (from a vodka-distillation page) The scale of operation is one where 10 kg of sugar per batch are fermented to a crude beer which is then
ygData.messageBody:
At 11:51 AM 8/27/99 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>With that said, everyone knows that not everything in EQ is logical. Case
>in point is the vodka recipe that is the current hot topic on the brewers
>list. People have been trying for weeks to discover this recipe. All kinds
>of logical ingredient combinations were tried. This week the recipe was
>discovered/leaked by Verant. One of the ingredients for vodka is short
>beer. No way in hell would anyone ever think to include beer as part of a
>recipe for vodka. I'm sure there are other examples out there.

Um.... *cough* (from a vodka-distillation page)
"The scale of operation is one where 10 kg of sugar per batch are fermented
to a crude "beer"
which is then distilled to yield 11 liters of 40% vodka."

I have a feeling that's where the idea came from...

Talies
